include(ExternalProject)

SET( HTSLIB_DEPENDENCIES )

include(zlib.cmake)
LIST(APPEND HTSLIB_DEPENDENCIES ${ZLIB_PROJECT})
include(tabix.cmake)
LIST(APPEND HTSLIB_DEPENDENCIES ${TABIX_PROJECT})

SET(HTSLIB_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)

SET(HTSLIB_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/externals/htslib_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "external project directory")
SET(HTSLIB_EXTERNAL_PROJECT htslib_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "all htslib external projects")
ExternalProject_Add(${HTSLIB_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
    DEPENDS ${HTSLIB_DEPENDENCIES}
    DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	SOURCE_DIR ${HTSLIB_SOURCE_DIR}
	BINARY_DIR ${HTSLIB_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bin
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
        -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
        -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}
)
